presentationColumns.name: Invoice Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice amount which includes ChargeBack, Deposits, Guarantee, Invoices invoice types and excludes the Credit Memo and Debit Memo transaction type.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Transactions.Invoice Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Invoice Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices count which includes Chargeback, Deposits, Guarantee, Invoices invoice types and excludes the Credit Memo and Debit Memo transaction type.

presentationColumns.name: Avg Invoice Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Invoices Amount / Invoices Count.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Transactions.Avg Invoice Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Debit Memos Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice amount for the Debit Memo transaction type.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Transactions.Debit Memos Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Debit Memos Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices count for Debit Memo transaction type.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Transactions.Debit Memos Count

presentationColumns.name: Avg Debit Memos Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Debit Memos Amount / Debit Memos Count.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Transactions.Avg Debit Memos Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Credit Memos Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice amount for the Credit Memo transaction type.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Transactions.Credit Memos Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Credit Memos Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices count for Credit Memo transaction type.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Transactions.Credit Memos Count

presentationColumns.name: Avg Credit Memos Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Credit Memos Amount / Credit Memos Count.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Transactions.Avg Credit Memos Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Total Transactions Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of invoice amount, Debit Memos Amount and Credit Memos Amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Transactions.Total Transactions Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Total Transactions Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the distinct count of invoice numbers.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Transactions.Total Transactions Count
